## PredicateComparison type

Matching predicate comparison

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type PredicateComparison<PT> = {
    eq?: PT;
    neq?: PT;
    gt?: PT;
    gte?: PT;
    lt?: PT;
    lte?: PT;
    inq?: PT[];
    nin?: PT[];
    between?: [PT, PT];
    exists?: boolean;
    like?: PT;
    nlike?: PT;
    ilike?: PT;
    nilike?: PT;
    regexp?: string | RegExp;
};
```
